data.name: Escape from the Lockdown: The Demon Fortress (Steam Version) - Day 3 - Ending
data.detailed_description:
If you have finished Day 2 and are ready to save the doomed world, you can purchase the rest of the game from this page!
(This DLC includes Day3 ~Ending)
*You can't purchase this DLC if you have not purchased Day 2
data.about_the_game:
If you have finished Day 2 and are ready to save the doomed world, you can purchase the rest of the game from this page!

data.short_description: SCRAP's famous online Real Escape Game is now available on Steam! "Escape from the Lockdown: The Demon Fortress", which has attracted over 35,000 players, is now playable on Steam! *This bundle include Day3 ~Ending

fullgame.name: Escape from the Lockdown: The Demon Fortress (Steam Version) - Day 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 or x64, architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
